name: Allure of Darkness
desc: Draw 2 cards, then banish 1 DARK monster from your hand, or, if you do not have any in your hand, send your entire hand to the GY.
Set_Name: Speed Duel Starter Decks: Twisted Nightmares

name: Bowganian
desc: Once per turn, during your Standby Phase: Inflict 600 damage to your opponent.
Set_Name: Speed Duel Starter Decks: Twisted Nightmares

name: Brave Scizzar
desc: Armed with a mass of scissors, this monster can clip an enemy into any desired shape and size.
Set_Name: Speed Duel Starter Decks: Twisted Nightmares

name: Byser Shock
desc: If this card is Summoned: Return all Set cards on the field to the hand.
Set_Name: Speed Duel Starter Decks: Twisted Nightmares

name: Coffin Seller
desc: Each time a monster(s) is sent to your opponent's GY: Inflict 300 damage to your opponent.
Set_Name: Speed Duel Starter Decks: Twisted Nightmares

name: Common Charity
desc: Draw 2 cards, then banish 1 Normal Monster from your hand, or, if you do not have any in your hand, send your entire hand to the GY.
Set_Name: Speed Duel Starter Decks: Twisted Nightmares

name: Creature Seizure
desc: Each player gives their opponent control of 1 of their monsters (controller's choice). You must choose a face-up Normal Monster.
Set_Name: Speed Duel Starter Decks: Twisted Nightmares

name: Creeping Darkness
desc: Banish 2 DARK monsters from your GY; add 1 Level 4 DARK monster from your Deck to your hand.
Set_Name: Speed Duel Starter Decks: Twisted Nightmares

name: Dark Eruption
desc: Target 1 DARK monster with 1500 or less ATK in your GY; add that target to your hand.
Set_Name: Speed Duel Starter Decks: Twisted Nightmares

name: Dark Jeroid
desc: If this card is Summoned: Target 1 face-up monster on the field; it loses 800 ATK.
Set_Name: Speed Duel Starter Decks: Twisted Nightmares

name: Dark Lucius LV4
desc: Negate the effects of your opponent's monsters destroyed by battle with this card. Once per turn, during the Standby Phase of your next turn after this card has destroyed a monster by battle: You can send this card to the GY; Special Summon 1 "Dark Lucius LV6" from your hand or Deck.
Set_Name: Speed Duel Starter Decks: Twisted Nightmares

name: Dark Lucius LV6
desc: If this card was Special Summoned by the effect of "Dark Lucius LV4", negate the effects of your opponent's monsters destroyed by battle with this card. Once per turn, during the Standby Phase of your next turn after this card negated your opponent's monster effect by this effect: You can send this card to the GY; Special Summon 1 "Dark Lucius LV8" from your hand or Deck.
Set_Name: Speed Duel Starter Decks: Twisted Nightmares

name: Dark Lucius LV8
desc: If this card was Special Summoned by the effect of "Dark Lucius LV6", banish your opponent's monsters destroyed by battle with this card, also negate their effects.
Set_Name: Speed Duel Starter Decks: Twisted Nightmares

name: Dark Mimic LV1
desc:
FLIP: Draw 1 card.
Once per turn, during your Standby Phase: You can send this card to the GY; Special Summon 1 "Dark Mimic LV3" from your hand or Deck.
Set_Name: Speed Duel Starter Decks: Twisted Nightmares

name: Dark Mimic LV3
desc: If this card is destroyed by battle and sent to the GY: Draw 1 card, but if this card was Special Summoned by the effect of "Dark Mimic LV1", draw 2 cards instead.
Set_Name: Speed Duel Starter Decks: Twisted Nightmares

name: Dark Necrofear
desc: Cannot be Normal Summoned/Set. Must first be Special Summoned (from your hand) by banishing 3 Fiend monsters from your GY. During the End Phase, if this card is in your GY because it was destroyed in your Monster Zone by an opponent's card and sent there this turn: Target 1 face-up monster your opponent controls; equip this card to that target. While this card is equipped to a monster by this effect, take control of that monster.
Set_Name: Speed Duel Starter Decks: Twisted Nightmares

name: Dark Prisoner
desc: This monster bends light to hide its image from the eyes of opponents.
Set_Name: Speed Duel Starter Decks: Twisted Nightmares

name: Dark Ruler Ha Des
desc: Cannot be Special Summoned from the GY. Negate the effects of monsters destroyed by battle with Fiend monsters you control.
Set_Name: Speed Duel Starter Decks: Twisted Nightmares

name: Dokuroyaiba
desc: A boomerang with brains that will pursue a target to the ends of the earth.
Set_Name: Speed Duel Starter Decks: Twisted Nightmares

name: Drillago
desc: If the only cards your opponent controls are face-up monsters with 1600 or more ATK, this card can attack your opponent directly.
Set_Name: Speed Duel Starter Decks: Twisted Nightmares

name: Earthbound Spirit
desc: A vengeful creature formed by the spirits of fallen warriors, it drags any who dare approach it into the deepest bowels of the earth.
Set_Name: Speed Duel Starter Decks: Twisted Nightmares

name: Faustian Bargain
desc: Target 1 Special Summoned monster on either field; send it to the GY, and if you do, Special Summon 1 Level 4 or lower Normal Monster from your hand.
Set_Name: Speed Duel Starter Decks: Twisted Nightmares

name: Gaap the Divine Soldier
desc: All monsters are changed to Attack Position, also their battle positions cannot be changed. (Flip Effects are not activated.) Once per turn: You can reveal any number of Fiend monsters in your hand; this card gains 300 ATK for each, until the end of this turn.
Set_Name: Speed Duel Starter Decks: Twisted Nightmares

name: Gil Garth
desc: This steel-armored terror machine ruthlessly strikes down enemies with its giant katana.
Set_Name: Speed Duel Starter Decks: Twisted Nightmares

name: Headless Knight
desc: A haunted spirit of a falsely accused knight who wanders in search of truth and justice.
Set_Name: Speed Duel Starter Decks: Twisted Nightmares

name: Helpoemer
desc: Cannot be Special Summoned from the GY. At the end of your opponent's Battle Phase, if this card is in the GY because it was destroyed by battle: Make your opponent discard 1 random card. This card must be in the GY to activate and to resolve this effect.
Set_Name: Speed Duel Starter Decks: Twisted Nightmares

name: Inner Conflict
desc:
[Flip this card over when you activate this Skill.]

Activate this Skill during your Main Phase. Once per Duel, you can pay half your LP and take control of 1 monster your opponent controls until the End Phase, but it cannot attack directly this turn.
Set_Name: Speed Duel Starter Decks: Twisted Nightmares

name: Into the Darkness Below
desc:
[Flip this card over when you activate this Skill.]

Activate this Skill during your Main Phase. Once per turn, you can discard 1 Normal Fiend Monster, then use 1 of the following Skills.
● Draw 1 card, also flip this card over.
● If you have 4 or more Fiend Normal Monsters with different names in your GY, add 1 monster from your Deck to your hand, also flip this card over.
Set_Name: Speed Duel Starter Decks: Twisted Nightmares

name: Lady Assailant of Flames
desc: FLIP: Banish the top 3 cards of your Deck; inflict 800 damage to your opponent.
Set_Name: Speed Duel Starter Decks: Twisted Nightmares

name: Lancer Archfiend
desc: Once per turn, when your monster declares an attack on your opponent's Defense Position monster: You can activate this effect; during that battle, if that monster attacks a Defense Position monster, inflict piercing battle damage to your opponent.
Set_Name: Speed Duel Starter Decks: Twisted Nightmares

name: Lava Golem
desc: Cannot be Normal Summoned/Set. Must first be Special Summoned (from your hand) to your opponent's field by Tributing 2 monsters they control. You cannot Normal Summon/Set the turn you Special Summon this card. Once per turn, during your Standby Phase: Take 1000 damage.
Set_Name: Speed Duel Starter Decks: Twisted Nightmares

name: Legendary Fiend
desc: Once per turn, during your Standby Phase: This card gains 700 ATK.
Set_Name: Speed Duel Starter Decks: Twisted Nightmares

name: Lesser Fiend
desc:
(This card is always treated as an "Archfiend" card.)
Banish any monster destroyed by battle with this card.
Set_Name: Speed Duel Starter Decks: Twisted Nightmares

name: Level Up!
desc: Send 1 face-up "LV" monster you control to the GY; Special Summon 1 monster from your hand or Deck that is listed in the sent monster's text, ignoring its Summoning conditions.
Set_Name: Speed Duel Starter Decks: Twisted Nightmares

name: Mad Reloader
desc: If this card is destroyed by battle and sent to the GY: Send 2 cards from your hand to the GY, and if you do, draw 2 cards.
Set_Name: Speed Duel Starter Decks: Twisted Nightmares

name: Magical Stone Excavation
desc: Discard 2 cards, then target 1 Spell in your GY; add it to your hand.
Set_Name: Speed Duel Starter Decks: Twisted Nightmares

name: Mask of Darkness
desc: FLIP: Target 1 Trap in your GY; add that target to your hand.
Set_Name: Speed Duel Starter Decks: Twisted Nightmares

name: Mefist the Infernal General
desc: If this card attacks a Defense Position monster, inflict piercing battle damage. If this card inflicts battle damage to your opponent: Make your opponent discard 1 random card.
Set_Name: Speed Duel Starter Decks: Twisted Nightmares

name: Melchid the Four-Face Beast
desc: This monster has four different masks for four different attacks.
Set_Name: Speed Duel Starter Decks: Twisted Nightmares

name: Metal Reflect Slime
desc: Special Summon this card in Defense Position as an Effect Monster (Aqua/WATER/Level 10/ATK 0/DEF 3000). (This card is also still a Trap.) This card cannot attack.
Set_Name: Speed Duel Starter Decks: Twisted Nightmares

name: Neck Hunter
desc: A fiend that wields a mean sickle and fires devastating beams from its eyes.
Set_Name: Speed Duel Starter Decks: Twisted Nightmares

name: Newdoria
desc: If this card is destroyed by battle and sent to the GY: Target 1 monster on the field; destroy that target.
Set_Name: Speed Duel Starter Decks: Twisted Nightmares

name: Nightmare Wheel
desc: Activate this card by targeting 1 monster your opponent controls; it cannot attack or change its battle position. When it leaves the field, destroy this card. Once per turn, during your Standby Phase: Inflict 500 damage to your opponent. That monster must be on the field to activate and to resolve this effect.
Set_Name: Speed Duel Starter Decks: Twisted Nightmares

name: Offerings to the Doomed
desc: Target 1 face-up monster on the field; destroy that target, also skip your next Draw Phase.
Set_Name: Speed Duel Starter Decks: Twisted Nightmares

name: Prideful Roar
desc: During damage calculation, if your monster battles an opponent's monster with a higher ATK: Pay LP equal to the difference in ATK; your monster gains ATK equal to that difference +300, during damage calculation only.
Set_Name: Speed Duel Starter Decks: Twisted Nightmares

name: Prometheus, King of the Shadows
desc: If this card is Normal Summoned: Banish 1 or more DARK monsters from your GY, and if you do, this card gains 400 ATK for each, until the end of this turn.
Set_Name: Speed Duel Starter Decks: Twisted Nightmares

name: Puppet Master
desc: When this card is Tribute Summoned: You can pay 2000 LP, then target 2 Fiend monsters in your GY; Special Summon those targets, but they cannot attack this turn.
Set_Name: Speed Duel Starter Decks: Twisted Nightmares

name: Rope of Life
desc: When a monster(s) is destroyed by battle and sent to your GY: Discard your entire hand (min.1), then target 1 of those monsters; Special Summon it, and if you do, it gains 800 ATK.
Set_Name: Speed Duel Starter Decks: Twisted Nightmares

name: Santa Claws
desc: You can Special Summon this card (from your hand) to your opponent's field in Defense Position, by Tributing 1 monster they control. If Summoned this way, once, during the End Phase of this turn: You can draw 1 card.
Set_Name: Speed Duel Starter Decks: Twisted Nightmares

name: Shadow Reborn
desc:
[Flip this card over when you activate this Skill.]

Activate this Skill during your Main Phase. Once per Duel, you can pay half your LP and Special Summon 1 monster from either GY, but your opponent takes no battle damage this turn.
Set_Name: Speed Duel Starter Decks: Twisted Nightmares

name: Supply Squad
desc: Once per turn, if a monster(s) you control is destroyed by battle or card effect: Draw 1 card.
Set_Name: Speed Duel Starter Decks: Twisted Nightmares

name: Sword of Dark Destruction
desc: Equip only to a DARK monster. It gains 400 ATK and loses 200 DEF.
Set_Name: Speed Duel Starter Decks: Twisted Nightmares

name: That Which Feeds on Life
desc: A monster that feeds on the energy of other creatures.
Set_Name: Speed Duel Starter Decks: Twisted Nightmares

name: The Earl of Demise
desc: This gentlemanly creature is extremely wicked, feared by man and fiend alike.
Set_Name: Speed Duel Starter Decks: Twisted Nightmares

name: The Forceful Checkpoint
desc: When an opponent's monster declares an attack: Look at your opponent's hand, and if there is a Monster Card, negate the attack, then discard 1 monster from their hand (your choice).
Set_Name: Speed Duel Starter Decks: Twisted Nightmares

name: The Gross Ghost of Fled Dreams
desc: This monster feeds on the dreams of an unwary sleeper, dragging the victim into eternal slumber.
Set_Name: Speed Duel Starter Decks: Twisted Nightmares

name: The Shadow Who Controls the Dark
desc: A shadow that dwells in the dark, paralyzing its opponents and rendering them harmless.
Set_Name: Speed Duel Starter Decks: Twisted Nightmares

name: Tribute to the Doomed
desc: Discard 1 card, then target 1 monster on the field; destroy it.
Set_Name: Speed Duel Starter Decks: Twisted Nightmares

name: Twin-Headed Wolf
desc: While you control another Fiend monster, negate the effects of Flip monsters destroyed by battle with this card.
Set_Name: Speed Duel Starter Decks: Twisted Nightmares

name: Twisted Personality
desc:
[At the start of the Duel, flip this card over.]

Each time a player loses LP, place 1 counter on this card (max. 3). Once per turn, during your Main Phase, you can use 1 of the following Skills.
● Remove 2 counters from this card, then discard 1 random card from your opponent's hand.
● Remove 3 counters from this card, then destroy 1 face-up card your opponent controls.
Set_Name: Speed Duel Starter Decks: Twisted Nightmares

name: Twister
desc: Pay 500 LP, then target 1 face-up Spell/Trap on the field; destroy that target.
Set_Name: Speed Duel Starter Decks: Twisted Nightmares

name: Veil of Darkness
desc: During your Draw Phase, if you draw a DARK monster(s): You can reveal any number of them; send them to the GY, then you can draw 1 more card.
Set_Name: Speed Duel Starter Decks: Twisted Nightmares

name: Viser Des
desc: If this card is Normal Summoned: Target 1 monster your opponent controls; during your third Standby Phase after this effect's activation, destroy that monster. This card cannot be destroyed by battle while the targeted monster is on the field.
Set_Name: Speed Duel Starter Decks: Twisted Nightmares

name: Whiptail Crow
desc: Attacks from the skies with a whip-like tail.
Set_Name: Speed Duel Starter Decks: Twisted Nightmares

name: Yaiba Robo
desc: A cubical machine equipped with cutting blades for shredding an opponent to mincemeat.
Set_Name: Speed Duel Starter Decks: Twisted Nightmares

name: Zoma the Spirit
desc: Special Summon this card in Defense Position as an Effect Monster (Zombie/DARK/Level 4/ATK 1800/DEF 500). (This card is also still a Trap.) If this card Summoned this way is destroyed by battle: Inflict damage to your opponent equal to the ATK of the monster that destroyed it.
Set_Name: Speed Duel Starter Decks: Twisted Nightmares
